channel.title: [Protocol Question] How does this song work?
channel.description:
Decided to ask here because mopar generally tends to have smarter people lol.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iuPMFk0C1sU
How does this work? I have heard that RuneScape supports only MIDI files, but this song has lyrics and has real instruments, so how is this working?
This song is in 718+. ID: 1034 Location: 3443, 3162, 0
Hope I get informative responses!
[hr]
EDIT: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IUtETbsM7nQ
This also has the same.
ID: 1108

item.source: [Protocol Question] How does this song work?

item.title: [Protocol Question] How does this song work?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:3, topic:552580”]I know very little about the new engine but I know for a fact they support for wav and ogg at one point which would allow voices and such[/quote][quote=“sini, post:4, topic:552580”]^

yep.[/quote]
Odd. All the music editors we have (even in these revisions) only have .midi support, not to mention all the songs sound like MIDI files until you start hearing these songs with real instruments and real vocals. I know these are real and not just “seemingly real” because when they introduced the quest to have these types of songs, they stated:

The music is woven into the story, and includes recordings of real musicians and singers.

Read full topic
item.source: [Protocol Question] How does this song work?

item.title: [Protocol Question] How does this song work?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

They changed the system to allow regular mp3 IIRC (or at least changed it away from pure MIDI, that much I know) with the introduction of some quests & voices. I don’t remember what the full answer was, but I saw this asked recently and basically with some quest that introduced voices they had to add support for other sound files

Read full topic
